result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Westin Duane Smith in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls 16CM38, 15CM44, 16CM80 and 16CM56.  DEJ presented to court.  Def pleads NC to counts in DEJ.  No coercion.  Court accepts DEJ.  Def asks court to sign.  Court signs DEJ.  Adj.  klr
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 13, 2017 at 10:30 am.

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls cases at 10:28 a.m.  16CM38 and 16CM80.  Def not present.  DEJ prepared.  Hoffmann gives court background.  Has left messages for def.  Rescheduled.  Adjourned at 10:29 a.m.  klr
Pre-trial conference on March 16, 2017 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on April 13, 2017 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Westin Duane Smith in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls 15CM44, 16CM38 and 16CM80.  DA calls cases.  16CM80 is new complaint.  Defendand has recieved complaint, waives reading and stands mute.  NG to be entered by clerk.  Bond to continue.  DA stresses the no contact provision with A.N.  Requests def to appear for all court hearings and to meet with DHS today.  Court creates bond as an omnibus bonds.  Warrants are quashed.  Per court, no new conditions on bond.  klr
In court, same day as issued.

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court.  Frederick j Schellgell appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls 16CM80,38,56 and 15CM44.  Def does not appear.  Was scheduled for 1:45 and is now 2:05.  DA requests warrant be authorized.  Court authorizes warrant at DA's discretion.  klr
